MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG2 postcode area of Dumfries. It is been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:15am to repair a fault on our overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:04am on the 28th of April 2021.
